title: ARAM - Nasus, Barrier, Bard
body:
Can we change the tooltip for Nasus' Q on ARAM? It says every minion hit is 3 stacks (while it is 6 on ARAM). 

Also, I think the barrier summoner spell has a tooltip that presents grammatical errors (noticed in ARAM and only in game. Not sure it applies to Summoner's Rift)

Also, is there a chance that Bard gets more stack of his passive per chime, on ARAM? URF was balanced to allow him to reach a new milestone every 2 chimes. ARAM presents the problem that Bard can't roam as much as he needs to and sometimes the chimes spawn behind the enemy turret. I'm not suggesting a drastic adjustment as the URF's one, but maybe even a new milestone every 4 chimes could make it a bit more forgiving to decide not to dive the turret for that sweet sweet chime that is dissapearing...
